headline: AMGEN TO PRESENT AT CITI'S 2024 GLOBAL HEALTHCARE CONFERENCE
summary: Amgen (NASDAQ:AMGN) will present at Citi's 2024 Global Healthcare Conference at 9:30 a.m. ET on Thursday, Dec. 5, 2024. Peter Griffith, executive vice president and chief financial officer at Amgen, Jay Bradner, executive vice president of Research and Development and chief scientific officer at Amgen, and Susan Sweeney, executive vice president of Obesity and Related Conditions at Amgen, will participate in a fireside chat at the conference. The webcast will be broadcast over the internet simul

headline: This Stock Just Dropped by 12% in 1 Day: Should You Buy the Dip?
summary: The biotech industry can be volatile even for relatively large companies.  Amgen (NASDAQ: AMGN), one of the more prominent names in the game, just reminded us all of that fact.  Let's find out what the future holds for Amgen after its massive one-day drop.
